outputs.output_descr: The objective of this Project Preparation Grant is to develop a full project document for a UNDP/GEF project in the multifocal area, addressing barriers to biodiversity conservation, problems with land and soil degradation, issues of climate change and challenges to manage forests in a sustainable way through adopting in Belarus a new landscape approach to management of peatlands aiming to bring multiple ecological benefits.

The objective of this Project Preparation Grant is to develop a full project document for a UNDP/GEF project in the multifocal area, addressing barriers to biodiversity conservation, problems with land and soil degradation, issues of climate change and challenges to manage forests in a sustainable way through adopting in Belarus a new landscape approach to management of peatlands aiming to bring multiple ecological benefits.

project_descr: Project Preparation Grant Title: Landscape approach to management of peatlands aiming at multiple ecological benefits.
